channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: With 99 days to go, Trump’s camp is suddenly afraid that victory is slipping away
item.description: “The Democrats now have a candidate who can speak, who can attack. They have a weapon," said Republican National Committee member Henry Barbour. “They have a path.”

item.title: 5 things to know before the stock market opens Monday
item.description: Here are the most important news items that investors need to start their trading day.

item.title: McDonald's reports triple miss on earnings, sales and comps
Italy’s prime minister Meloni vows to reset relations with China and signs a three-year action plan in the midst of an EU-China trade war
item.description: Her five-day visit comes several months after Italy dropped out of China's Belt and Road Initiative, a policy implemented by Chinese leader Xi Jinping, to develop global infrastructure power.

item.title: Monday's analyst calls: Apple price target hike ahead of earnings, Tesla a top pick
item.description: Two tech companies were among the names being talked about by analysts on Monday.

item.title: Biden proposes 18-year term limits for Supreme Court justices
Fed officials expected to cut rates only once in 2024 but now the market is betting on 3 cuts this year
item.description: A rate reduction this fall — the first since the pandemic — would amount to a momentous shift and a potential boost to the economy.

item.title: Biden rolls out plan to overhaul the Supreme Court
item.description: The Supreme Court previously ruled that Donald Trump was immune from criminal prosecution for official acts he did as president.

item.title: Swiss pharma giant Roche is ‘fast-tracking’ development of an experimental Wegovy challenger pill for weight loss
item.description: Roche is working on bringing its weight-loss medications to patients "faster than anticipated,” making it yet another contender in the weight-loss drug market.

item.title: Philips shares jump 10.5% as second-quarter sales grow despite China weakness
item.description: Shares of Philips jumped in early deals Monday after the Dutch device maker reported better-than-expected second-quarter earnings.

item.title: Abbott, Reckitt shares slide on $495 million jury award in baby formula case
Biden presents Supreme Court overhaul that would let president appoint a justice every 2 years to 18-year terms
item.description: He also wants Congress to establish a code of ethics for justices that would require justices to disclose gifts, refrain from public political activity and recuse themselves when they or their spouses have conflicts of interest.

item.title: Heineken shares fall 8% after first-half profit miss
item.description: Operting profit showed organic growth of 12.5%, below a company-compiled consensus forecast of 13.2%.

item.title: How far and how fast will the Fed cut interest rates?
